p filter: The issue could be tied the circuit breaker, the fan motor, or loose wiring. If it’s the circuit breaker, a common cause is dirty air filter or debris around the AC unit. For the other issues dealing with the fan motor or loose wiring, call your technician for help.
li coil: Leaking Indoor/Outdoor AC or Heat Pump Coil
p fan: The issue could be tied the circuit breaker, the fan motor, or loose wiring. If it’s the circuit breaker, a common cause is dirty air filter or debris around the AC unit. For the other issues dealing with the fan motor or loose wiring, call your technician for help.
h2 repair: Call Colman Air for AC Repair
p repair: If your AC is making any of the noises above, don’t hesitate to give us a call today. One of our trained technicians will be out to your home as soon as possible to diagnose the underlying cause and repair the issue.
p maintenance: Routine maintenance checkups with your trusted technician is an easy way to ensure your system is working as it should and not making excess noise.

p fan: If you hear a screaming or screeching noise, it may be your air conditioning system. A screeching noise typically means the issue is coming from one of two places – your fan motor or your compressor.
p repair: If you need repairs or installations, please call us today.
